Uses of Class
net.dapete.exceptional.stream.ExceptionalStream

Packages that use ExceptionalStream
Package
Description
net.dapete.exceptional.stream
This package provides utilities for handling checked exceptions in Streams.

  • Uses of ExceptionalStream in net.dapete.exceptional.stream
